problem.p: A block attached to a spring is oscillating between point X (fully compressed) and point Y (fully stretched). At point O (relaxed spring), which of the following quantities would reach its maximum value?

choice.name: foil3
choice.text: The magnitude of the block's momentum

choice.name: foil4
choice.text: The magnitude of the block's acceleration

choice.name: foil5
choice.text: The block's kinetic energy & the block's momentum

choice.name: foil6
choice.text: The spring potential energy & the block's acceleration
